mapper.select: SELECT WR.Customer_ID,Customer_NM, WB.Product_ID, PP.ECount_CD, PT.Product_Nm, PP.Product_Capa, User_Nm Sales_Nm, WB.Order_Count, OP.Order_Amount/OP.Order_Count Product_Price, WB.Order_Count*Product_Price Supply_Price,WB.Order_Count*Product_Price*0.1 VAT FROM ( SELECT count(Work_Seq) Order_Count,Work_Report_Seq,Product_ID, Product_Price_Seq,Create_ID FROM TB_Work_Bottle WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0308','0309') AND DATE_FORMAT(Create_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(curdate(),'%Y/%m/%d') Group By Work_Report_Seq,Product_ID, Product_Price_Seq ,Create_ID ) WB,TB_Work_Report WR ,TB_Order_Product OP,TB_Product PT, TB_Product_Price PP, TB_Customer TC, TB_User TU WHERE WB.Work_Report_Seq = WR.Work_Report_Seq AND WR.Order_ID = OP.Order_ID AND WB.Product_Price_Seq = OP.Product_Price_Seq AND WB.Product_ID = PT.Product_ID AND WB.Product_ID = PP.Product_ID AND WB.Product_Price_Seq = PP.Product_Price_Seq AND WR.Customer_ID = TC.Customer_ID AND WB.Create_ID = TU.User_Id Order By WB.Work_Report_Seq
